body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Animals               Animals         Animals that live at Washita Battlefield National Historic Site NPS Photo  Washita Battlefield National Historic Site is known more for the events that took place here on November 27, 1868 than as a 'natural park.' This mixed-grass prairie, however, is still considered home to a wide variety of birds, mammals, reptiles, and more!      So many different animals! Amphibians Birds Mammals Reptiles
title: Washita Battlefield National Historic Site: Animals
